mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Boswell, Albert T.

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Boswell, Albert T. Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture right fore arm (radius). Location Wounded: Cloyd Mountain. Date Wounded: 1864/05/09. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Discharged from service .
